items.name: Object_GridLayout
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_GridLayout
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_GridLayout extends ui.Object_UIElement
    ###*
    * A grid-layout which layouts all it sub-objects
    * in a grid of rows and columns.
    *
    * @module ui
    * @class Object_GridLayout
    * @extends ui.Object_UIElement
    * @memberof ui
    * @constructor
    ###  
    constructor: (x, y, width, height, rows, columns) ->
        super()
        @dstRect.set(x || 0, y || 0, width || 1, height || 1 )
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the layout is resizable.
        * @property resizable
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @resizable = no
        
        ###*
        * The UI object's animator-component to execute different kind of animations like move, rotate, etc. on it.
        * @property animator
        * @type vn.Component_Animator
        ###
        @animator = new gs.Component_Animator()
        
        ###*
        * The layout's sub-objects.
        * @property controls
        * @type ui.Object_UIElement[]
        ###
        @controls = []
        
        ###*
        * Number of rows for the grid.
        * @property rows
        * @type number
        ###
        @rows = rows
        
        ###*
        * Number of columns for the grid.
        * @property columns
        * @type number
        ###
        @columns = columns
        
        ###*
        * The spacing between the cells of the grid.
        * @property cellSpacing
        * @type ui.Spacing
        ###
        @cellSpacing = [0, 0, 0, 0]
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the layouts resizes to fit its content.
        * @property sizeToFit
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @sizeToFit = no
        
        ###*
        * The behavior component to add grid-layout specific behavior.
        * @property behavior
        * @type gs.Component_GridLayoutBehavior
        ###
        @behavior = new gs.Component_GridLayoutBehavior()
        
        @addComponent(@behavior)
        @addComponent(@animator)
        
ui.Object_GridLayout = Object_GridLayout
